ProductInfo.Features:
Newest Allwinner Dual Core CPU (1.5GHz) with Quad core Mali-400 MP GPU, offer unprecedented fast surfing online, video playing and 3D games playing experience
8GB storage capacity, built-in Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
Built-in 3.7V 3000mAh Li-Polymer rechargeable battery, enjoy longer running time (almost 4 hours for surfing and movies, 3 days for stand-by status)
ProductInfo.Name: SquarePad 7i -- 7 inch Android Tablet PC, 4.2.2 Jelly Bean OS, Dual Core, Allwinner A23 CPU, Dual Cameras, 5 Point Capacitive Touch Screen, 8GB Storage, Black Color
